snippet: “I never said it,” Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said about an ungentlemanly quotation attributed to him in a magazine’s profile of Speaker Christine C. Quinn.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg denies making comment about a woman's attractive backside that has been attributed to him in a New York magazine article.
lead_paragraph: “I never said it,” Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg said about an ungentlemanly quotation attributed to him in a magazine’s profile of Speaker Christine C. Quinn.

headline.seo: Bloomberg Denies Commenting on Woman’s Derrière
headline.main: Mayor Denies Commenting on Woman’s Derrière
headline.print_headline: Mayor Says He Uttered No Remark On a Derrière
